name: SupplyChainAttack
description: Case template for managing supply chain attack incidents.
author: Jes√∫s Angosto
summary: Investigation and mitigation of a supply chain compromise.

tasks.title: Identify affected software or services
tasks.description: Determine which third-party products or services have been compromised.

tasks.title: Analyze organizational impact
tasks.description: Review which internal systems rely on the compromised components.

tasks.title: Contain and mitigate
tasks.description: Isolate affected systems and apply temporary mitigations in coordination with the vendor.

tasks.title: Review integrity and communications
tasks.description: Validate file and configuration integrity and inspect suspicious outbound connections.

tasks.title: Coordinate with third parties
tasks.description: Work with vendors, CERTs, and authorities on remediation and notification.

tasks.title: Chain of custody
tasks.description: Document and preserve evidence tied to the supply chain breach.

tasks.title: Lessons learned
tasks.description: Update vendor management processes and security controls for future assessments.

notes.title: Compromised software or services
notes.content: List and describe the third-party products or services that were affected.

notes.title: Collected evidence
notes.content: Summary of artifacts and logs that were gathered.

notes.title: Chain of custody
notes.content: Documentation that tracks how evidence was handled and preserved.

notes.title: Lessons learned
notes.content: Post-incident analysis and proposed improvements for vendor management.
